title: Two State Ministers to continue previous portfolios
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): The two State Ministers Lohan Ratwatte and Piyal Nishantha will continue their tenure in their previous portfolios, the Presidential Media Division says in a statement.

Accordingly, Lohan Ratwatte will continue as the State Minister of  Gem and Jewellery Related Industries and Piyal Nishantha will continue as the State Minister of Women and Child Development, Pre-schools and Primary Education, School Infrastructure and Education Services.
Court rejects application to issue order on Galle Face Protest
